question: You had an appointment with the bank and now you realized that you can't make it for that .write a letter to the manager-Give details about your appointment and dates.-Explain the reason why you cannot make it.-Ask for other dates.
text: I have been given an appointment to meet you regarding my loan process at your bank on coming Monday evening .It is sad to inform you that I won't be able to make it to the meeting .Since my office timings are clashing with your time.I have an important  client meeting at the same time we have planned .

I am pretty sure this will be disappointing to you and it will make more changes in your tight schedule if we replan this meet.Even though it is difficult , can you please consider  rescheduling our meet regarding the same?

As I have checked the dates, You will be free on Wednesday evening during the end of bank hours.And also I will be available at the same timing .If you are okay with it we can plan on the mentioned time .
Let me know your availability and thoughts on this . Looking forward to your response .Kindly consider my obligation .
